1141.content: You wake up to see the you're in glass container. You sit and wait watching the predators pass by, some tapping the glass. You wait and then see something unexpected a creature that had a metal weapon with green armor. You don't move, but watch it tap on the control panel of your pod. Then it opens *STRIKE NOW* you think but then it shot some sort of braces on your arms, they fall limp then he motions you forward. You walk slowly to him then, SLASH!!!!! You rip of his head with your tail. You kneel down and stab the button he pressed for the braces with you little mouth.
1141.title: Alone.....

1151.content:
you squirm around trying to break out of the glass container your floating in. your hear strange loud sound and a flashing red light. Then a bunch of your captors run around shouting something. Then
CRASH!!!!!!!!
The people were flinged off their feet, branches burst through the walls and a block of metal broke your container spilling out all of the liquid.then it stopped.you crawl out of the broken container looking around many aliens are escaping out of the ship. it's safe for now you think then you
1151.title: predator ship

11512.content: you crawl around the ship looking for a host there were many of these people dead. then you hear a shuffle then a crash. you hide under a slab of metal. you take a peek and see a person he was making a bunch of sounds by poking his wrist. you crawl slowly to it hiding every time it looked up then... another alien drone leaps at it but the person stab the drones stomach. Now is your chance! you leap at the person clamping on its face laying your egg. once done you fall off and die....
11512.title: anyone home?

115121.content: you wake up seeing only green you try to move but then you hear some thing moan. Then you lash out eating through the green then lime then you find white tube-like things blocking your way all the while you hear strange screaming. you bite clean through this and rip through more green. finally you burst out of your prison and crawl off of the predators chest you crawl into the hole you found and eat a family of rabbits. you crawl out side and curl into a ball for sleep. forming a cocoon.
115121.title: chestburster

11513.content:
As you scuttled quickly across the ground, you could sense your siblings nearby. Several of them were only around the corner, and so you immediatly found them. All warriors, they were fighting against a trio of Predators. The two sides seemed to be evenly matched, and it looked like it could go on for a while. However, one of the Xenomorphs managed to sneak away from the battle, moving by your position. The alien looked at you for a moment, before it hissed and kept moving. Knowing that you were safer with one of your siblings, you crawled up beside the Xenomorph, jumping up and nestling yourself between your larger brother's spines. The alien makes no reaction to this as it kept moving.

Soon, the alien managed to go into an open vent, crawling through the network until you both came over an opening. Below, there were several eject pods that could go down to the planet below. Quickly, your brother tore through the grid and jumped down to the ground. Your brother moved into the nearest pods, you still holding on. You watched as the door closed behind you, and your brother rammed the control pad. Soon, the pod launched itself from the ship, which looked like it was coming down towards the planet. The pod you both were in flew off from the ship, and flew through the atmosphere, the outer layer of metal heating up, but otherwise no damage.

The pod crashed down onto a large area of land, sliding across the ground before coming to a halt. There was a moment of silence, before your brother ended it by ramming into the door. The door opened up, and the alien crawled out. You jumped off from your brother's back, moving slowly across the ground. You immediatly decided to find a host, and scuttling to where you sensed life, you came across a small beach. You saw that the water was shallow, enough so you could swim, and there were several creatures there. Some were too big to be a host, but in the water, there were several small creatures, small enough that they could be a host to you.

You crawled into the water, finding the nearest potential host to be a...
11513.title: cling onto a near by aliens back

info.brief_description: Come into the world of war aliens fighting predators.And stupid humans stuck in the middle
info.description: Look, just a regular avp story no sex more than once per person, and not to much description (this is to be made for fans not horny kids w/ alien fetishes OK). Have fun! Put as much blood and guts in as you want. And finally no giant monsters, robots, or famous people (you may have human/ 2x human sized Robots and Monsters... aww hell you can have celeberties here (to die). use your imagination on the names.Now let the war begin!!! HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!
